fields_of_interest: Culture, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Youth, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: The main initiatives we follow are EU Funding Programmes with a special focus on Horizon 2020. Other related agendas are Innovation and Research
goals__remit: EUROHUB Consultancy Group brings together a dedicated and highly committed team of specialists in European affairs.  Coming from strong academic backgrounds, the team members of EUROHUB Consultancy Group offers their clients strategic counsel, insightful research and tailored creative solutions.   EUROHUB Consultancy Group offers a range of services on European affairs incorporating interest representation, research and EU funding programmes, such as Horizon 2020.
